title: Weirdhouse Cinema: The Masque of the Red Death
itunes:title: Weirdhouse Cinema: The Masque of the Red Death
description:
As the Red Death ravages the surrounding countryside, Prince Prospero and his followers celebrate darkness within their rainbow-hued castle. In this episode of Weirdhouse Cinema, Rob and Joe discuss the 1964 Roger Corman film “The Masque of the Red Death,” based on two different works from Edgar Allen Poe and starring the legendary Vincent Price, Hazel Court and Jane Asher.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
